title: Does the size boost of Elixir of Iron stack with Sterak's gage Size boost?
body:
Just curious.

Also I love this item, gives Bruisers so many options.
Sick of seeing Titanic Hydra though. That item is a bit BS to be honest, seeing as the Cleave is a huge deterrent to even being near an ally and forces your team to split plus the amount of Damage it gives to tanks is a bit BS.

replies.body: So you want to try full stacks cho with lulu's ult, iron elixir and sterak's gate, pff who needs yasuo's wind wall when cho's hotbox is the size of the whole lane. just hide the whole team behind him.
